SEARCH
Package model

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
model.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
This class represents a controller for managing biblio products, users, and invoices.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Controller()
    Constructs a new Controller object.

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller()
      Constructs a new Controller object. Initializes the lists of users, biblio products, and invoices. Calls the testCases() method to perform initial test cases.

  • Method Details

    • testCases

      public void testCases()
      Performs initial test cases by creating users and biblio products and adding them to the respective lists.

    • generateHEXAID

      public String generateHEXAID()
      Generates a random HEXAID consisting of three hexadecimal digits.
      Returns:
      The generated HEXAID as a string.

    • generateALFAID

      public String generateALFAID()
      Generates a random ALFAID consisting of three alphanumeric characters.
      Returns:
      The generated ALFAID as a string.

    • registerUser

      public boolean registerUser(String nameUser, String cc, Calendar vinculationDate, int optionUser)
      Registers a new user with the specified name, ID number, vinculation date, and user type.
      Parameters:
      nameUser - The name of the user.
      cc - The ID number of the user.
      vinculationDate - The vinculation date of the user.
      optionUser - The user type option (1 for Standard, 2 for Premium).
      Returns:
      True if the user is successfully registered, false otherwise.

    • registerBiblioProducts

      public boolean registerBiblioProducts(String name, String id, int numberPages, String shortReview, int genres, String URL, int value, int numSoldBooks, int optionProducts, int yearPostDate, int monthPostDate, int dayPostDate, int readedPages, int categorys, String issPeriod, int activeSubs)
      Registers a new biblio product with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the biblio product.
      id - The ID of the biblio product.
      numberPages - The number of pages in the biblio product.
      shortReview - The short review of the biblio product.
      genres - The genre option (1 for Fiction/Science, 2 for Fantasy, 3 for Historical Novel).
      URL - The URL of the biblio product.
      value - The value of the biblio product.
      numSoldBooks - The number of sold books (applicable only for books).
      optionProducts - The product type option (1 for Book, 2 for Magazine).
      yearPostDate - The year of the post date.
      monthPostDate - The month of the post date.
      dayPostDate - The day of the post date.
      readedPages - The number of pages read (applicable only for books).
      categorys - The category option (1 for Varieties, 2 for Design, 3 for Scientist).
      issPeriod - The issue period of the magazine (applicable only for magazines).
      activeSubs - The number of active subscriptions (applicable only for magazines).
      Returns:
      True if the biblio product is successfully registered, false otherwise.

    • modifyBook

      public boolean modifyBook(int option, String newName, String newId, int newNumberPages, String newShortReview, int newGenres, String newURL, int newValue, int newYearPostDate, int newMonthPostDate, int newDayPostDate)
      Modifies the details of a book based on the specified option and new values.
      Parameters:
      option - The option to select the book to modify.
      newName - The new name of the book.
      newId - The new ID of the book.
      newNumberPages - The new number of pages of the book.
      newShortReview - The new short review of the book.
      newGenres - The new genre option (1 for Fiction/Science, 2 for Fantasy, 3 for Historical Novel).
      newURL - The new URL of the book.
      newValue - The new value of the book.
      newYearPostDate - The new year of the post date.
      newMonthPostDate - The new month of the post date.
      newDayPostDate - The new day of the post date.
      Returns:
      True if the book is successfully modified, false otherwise.

    • modifyMagazine

      public boolean modifyMagazine(int option, String newName, String newId, int newNumberPages, String newIssPeriod, int newCategorys, String newURL, int newValue, int newYearPostDate, int newMonthPostDate, int newDayPostDate)
      Modifies the details of a magazine based on the specified option and new values.
      Parameters:
      option - The option to select the magazine to modify.
      newName - The new name of the magazine.
      newId - The new ID of the magazine.
      newNumberPages - The new number of pages of the magazine.
      newIssPeriod - The new issue period of the magazine.
      newCategorys - The new category option (1 for Varieties, 2 for Design, 3 for Scientist).
      newURL - The new URL of the magazine.
      newValue - The new value of the magazine.
      newYearPostDate - The new year of the post date.
      newMonthPostDate - The new month of the post date.
      newDayPostDate - The new day of the post date.
      Returns:
      True if the magazine is successfully modified, false otherwise.

    • deleteBooks

      public boolean deleteBooks(int bookIndex)
      Deletes a book from the list of bibliographic products based on the specified index.
      Parameters:
      bookIndex - The index of the book to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the book is successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • deleteMagazines

      public boolean deleteMagazines(int magazineIndex)
      Deletes a magazine from the list of bibliographic products based on the specified index.
      Parameters:
      magazineIndex - The index of the magazine to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the magazine is successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • printInvoice

      public void printInvoice(Invoice invoice)
      Prints the details of an invoice.
      Parameters:
      invoice - The invoice object to print.

    • buyBook

      public boolean buyBook(int optionBUY, int optionUser)
      Buys a book for a user based on the specified options.
      Parameters:
      optionBUY - The index of the book to buy.
      optionUser - The index of the user who is buying the book.
      Returns:
      True if the book is successfully bought, false otherwise.

    • buyMagazine

      public boolean buyMagazine(int optionBUY, int optionUser)
      Buys a magazine for a user based on the specified options.
      Parameters:
      optionBUY - The index of the magazine to buy.
      optionUser - The index of the user who is buying the magazine.
      Returns:
      True if the magazine is successfully bought, false otherwise.

    • consultLibrary

      public String consultLibrary(int optionUser)
      Consults the library for a specific user and returns the library information as a string.
      Parameters:
      optionUser - The index of the user to consult the library for.
      Returns:
      The library information for the user.

    • readingSession

      public String readingSession(String decisionUser, int optionUser, String option, int currentPage, int cont)
      Simulates a reading session for a user and returns a message with the session details and any additional information.
      Parameters:
      decisionUser - The ID of the bibliographic product being read.
      optionUser - The index of the user performing the reading session.
      option - The reading session option (e.g., "next", "previous", "go-to").
      currentPage - The current page being read.
      cont - The count of reading sessions.
      Returns:
      The message with the session details and additional information.

    • updateCurrentPage

      public int updateCurrentPage(String option, int currentPage, int numberPages)
      Updates the current page based on the given option.
      Parameters:
      option - The reading session option (e.g., "previous" or "next").
      currentPage - The current page being read.
      numberPages - The total number of pages in the book.
      Returns:
      The updated current page.

    • getNumberOfPages

      public int getNumberOfPages(String productCode)
      Retrieves the number of pages for the product with the given code.
      Parameters:
      productCode - The code of the product.
      Returns:
      The number of pages of the product, or 0 if not found.

    • firstReport

      public String firstReport()
      Generates the first report by accumulating the total number of read pages for books and magazines.
      Returns:
      The report message with the accumulated read pages for books and magazines.

    • showSuscribedMagazines

      public String showSuscribedMagazines(int optionUser)
      Retrieves the subscribed magazines for a given user.
      Parameters:
      optionUser - The index of the user.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the subscribed magazines.

    • cancelSuscription

      public boolean cancelSuscription(int optionUser, int optionMG)
      Cancels the subscription of a magazine for a given user.
      Parameters:
      optionUser - The index of the user.
      optionMG - The index of the magazine.
      Returns:
      True if the cancellation is successful, false otherwise.

      Returns:

      Returns:

    • getBHBookPrice

      public String getBHBookPrice()
      Retrieves the names and prices of all books in the library.
      Returns:

    • getBHMagazinePrice

      public String getBHMagazinePrice()
      Retrieves the names and prices of all magazines in the library.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the magazine names and prices.

    • getUserStandardInfo

      public String getUserStandardInfo()
      Retrieves the names of all standard users in the system.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the standard user names.

    • getUserPremiumInfo

      public String getUserPremiumInfo()
      Retrieves the names of all standard premium in the system.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the premium user names.
